attributes.action: Ban all face coverings in the UK in public places
attributes.additional_details:
Burkas and balaclavas have helped criminals commit crime. An armed robber was caught on CCTV wearing a burka, so his face was covered as he held up a branch of Gulf Bank.
Mustaf Jama suspected murderer fled the country wearing a niqab. Many more account across Europe.
Many robberies have happened with people wearing a balaclava. 
Not only are face coverings not necessary in the west, it isn't compulsory for anybody to have to hide their identity. Let's put security first.
attributes.background: Full face coverings in public shouldn't be aloud. It is a security threat. What is the use of CCTV if a persons face is completely covered. It is also very intimidating walking down the road to see someone with a balaclava on for instance walking towards you. The same with the full face veils.
